title: Marks on Nets and MacMahon on Mavs-Jazz
description:
Zach and ESPN's Bobby Marks discuss the Celtics sweeping the Nets, what's next for Brooklyn, the Simmons-Harden trade, Kevin Durant's career arc, more. Then ESPN's Tim MacMahon talks Mavs-Jazz ahead of Game 6.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
